text: The Art of Racing in the Rain is a 2019 American comedy-drama movie directed by Simon Curtis and written by Mark Bomback. It is based on the 2008 novel of the same name by author Garth Stein. The movie stars Milo Ventimiglia, Amanda Seyfried, Kevin Costner as the voice of Enzo the golden retriever. It was released on August 9, 2019 by 20th Century Fox. ==References== Category:2019 comedy-drama movies Category:2010s sports movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Auto racing movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Art of Racing in the Rain (movie)
